title: Urban Star Mens Jeans Relaxed Fit 2-Pack – Straight Leg Stretch Jeans for Men – Ultimate Comfort Superflex Pants Dark Blue Bundle 46W x 34L
description: PERFECT FIT. Tired of trying to squeeze into slim, skinny pants? Urban Star relaxed fit men’s jeans offer laid-back comfort at the waist, and a straight leg all the way down. These pants deliver the ideal fit, regardless of body type.
ULTIMATE COMFORT. Most comfortable pair of jeans you’ll ever own. And thanks to the stretch fabric, you don’t have to sacrifice shape or style to wear them. Guaranteed to become your favorite pants.

MOVE FREELY. The flexible cotton blend used in our jeans help maximize freedom of movement. Whether you’re playing sports with your kids or manning the grill, enjoy sweat-pant freedom in the form of high-quality men’s denim.
PREMIUM QUALITY. Deep pockets, reinforced stitching to ensure that belt loops and seams won’t rip, and a fail-proof brass zipper that always runs smoothly. Machine washable.
